overview:
Andrew Frawley is President of Marketing Technology and is responsible for the definition and delivery of Epsilonâ€™s multi-channel, digital and database marketing solutions. Andrew oversees the global operations of the industry’s largest email service provider.

Andrew has 25 years of operating experience, including 20 years at the senior management level, within enterprise software, software as a service (SaaS) and service companies. Andrewâ€™s expertise spans digital marketing, email marketing, CRM, database marketing and customer value management. He has advised over 200 clients including the largest and most sophisticated marketing organizations in the world.
